issue.title: [CF 1281] Range check doesnt seem to work with hex
issue.body:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SHex ^SRangeCheck^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N81209^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Trying to get range finder to work with hex

Latest version


> Posted by CurseForge user Morfaroth | Imported from CurseForge issue #1281 | Raw

comments.body:
It only works on valid targets for hex. You'll notice that this behavior is identical to the behavior of your action bars

Edited Aug 27, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks yeah i figured it out. User error.


> Posted by CurseForge user Morfaroth
